channel.title: Rest Area on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Rest Area on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Hunter Creek Rest Area - Highway Information
item.description: Route map for the adjacent area of British Columbia, and distances to major destinations. Three routes split off into the interior of British Columbia at Hope just east of here: BC-5 to Coquihalla Pass, TC-1 through the Frasier River Canyon, and BC-3 over Allison Pass.

item.title: AK-1 South - Hope Jct.
item.description: AK-1 South at Hope Jct. Hope is 17 miles north of this junction. Continue south on AK-1 for Seward (via AK-9) and Homer (via AK-1 / Sterling Highway).

item.title: I-94 East - North Dakota Tourist Information Center
item.description: I-94 East - North Dakota Tourist Information Center. This sign is located within the state of Montana, about 0.25 miles from the state line.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 241 Offramp at MTS-261
item.description: I-94 East - Exit 241 offramp at MTS-261. Turn right for MTS-261 south, to MT-7, and the Wibaux Rest Area. Turn left for MTS-261 North. There is no destination city for MTS-261 north, although it parallels the Montana - North Dakota border north to near Sidney.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-80. Use I-80 East/US-95 North to Lovelock; use I-80 West/Alt. US-95 South to Reno. Turn left to enter the Rest Area. Notice the post mile marker at the base of the sign.

item.title: I-10 East - Rest Area and Welcome Center
item.description: I-10 east at Rest Area/Tourist Welcome Center just east of the New Mexico/Texas State Line.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome Center/Rest Area
item.description: I-10 west - New Mexico Information Center/Rest Area.

item.title: I-40 West - Mojave Desert Services
item.description: Services in the Mojave Desert along I-40 west between here and Newberry Springs. Both Needles and Ludlow have services. Also, distance to the next Rest Areas and their status.

item.title: Rest Area Access Road at BL-10
item.description: New Mexico Rest Area access road at BL-10. Turn right for I-10 East to Deming. Turn left for BL-10 east into Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 20A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 20A - New Mexico Information Center/Rest Area. Speed limit drops from 75 MPH to 65 MPH as I-10 enters Lordsburg.
